```{r load data}
df_sample <- read_csv('cleanest_sample.csv')
df <- read_csv('clean.csv')
```
# delet NA rows, which mean the cancellation of the flights



```{r clean data}
# delet NA rows, which mean the cancellation of the flights
df_sample <- df_sample %>% filter(!is.na(dep_delay) & !is.na(arr_delay))
df <- df %>% filter(!is.na(dep_delay) & !is.na(arr_delay))

# subset data with relevent dep_delay and arr_delay values
df_sample <- df_sample %>% filter(-120 <= arr_delay <= 720 & -120 <= dep_delay <= 720)
df <- df %>% filter(-120 <= arr_delay <= 720 & -120 <= dep_delay <= 720)
```
